typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> movies
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		hack_license as string,
		vendor_id as string,
		rate_code as string,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		passenger_count as string,
		trip_time_in_secs as string,
		trip_distance as string,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> taxiSource
Filter1 derive(movie = '999979',
		title = 'Mark Story') ~> DerivedColumn1
movies filter(title == 'Toy Story') ~> Filter1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottonTomato = {Rotton Tomato}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
taxiSource derive(month = split(pickup_datetime,'-')[2],
		year = toInteger(split(pickup_datetime,'-')[1])+1,
		day = split(split(pickup_datetime,' ')[1],'-')[3]) ~> decompdatetime
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year
	)) ~> sink1
decompdatetime sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		year,
		month,
		day
	)) ~> taxiSink
